description.text: The links of this +1 chainmail are a dull, sickly white color that resembles old bone, and the suit's gauntlets are tipped with silver-black finger spikes. Once per day as a standard action, the wearer can ask one question of an undead creature or a destroyed undead creature's corpse, as if using speak with dead, except the target can only answer questions that pertain to events that occurred after it became undead.
